13th May, 2011 Statutory Instrument 169
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section fifty-six of the
Plant Breeder's Rights Act, 2007, the following Regulations are
hereby made:
PART I
PRELIMINARY
I. These Regulations may be cited as the Plant Breeder's Title
Rights (Forms and Fees) Regulations, 2011.
2. In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires­ Interpreta­
tion
" applicant" means an applicant for plant breeder's rights;
"grantee" has the meaning assigned to it in the Act;
" Institute" has the meaning assigned to it in the Act;
" Register " means the Register kept pursuant to section
thirty-three of the Act; and
"Registrar" has the meaning assigned to it in the Act.
PART II
PLANT BREENDER'S RIGHTS
3. An application for a plant variety denomination shall be in Application

at another recognised institution or by other breeders, the breeder
shall bear the additional cost of the testing.
